title: Start
body:
<<Deck>>
Alright, we're finally here!
<<Wenn>>
Ugh... wh-why's it gotta be so c-c-cold?
<<Tim>> 
Well that IS what this place is famous for. Rumour has it that the snow here has a mysterious power.
<<Wenn>>
Reaalllyy??? I don't buy it.
<<Merry>> 
He's not wrong. From my research, it's got something to do with what it's made out of.
<<Deck>>
Yeah sure. So, when do we get to have snowball fights, a-and make snow angels, oh oh! And build a snowman??
<<Merry>> 
[i]*chuckles*[/i] Hold on Deck. I need you guys to collect snow for an experiment Place these items in the snow so I can meassure it.
<<Deck>> 
Put items in snow, give to Merry, got it! Come on guys, let's go!
<<Wenn>> 
Huh? W-w-wait! Deck!!
<<Deck>> 
Woops!
<<Wenn>>
You big doof! You knocked everything all over the place!
<<Tim>> 
Welp, Guess we'll have to go and get it.
<<Wenn>> 
[i]You guys[/i] can go. I'm staying here.
<<Merry>> 
Guys!... sigh This should be interesting.

title: level1
body:
<<Deck>>
Aw man, where'd all the stuff go?
<<Merry>>
Just roll a snowball to the top of the hill and the frequency from the condensed pile of snow will help me show you where they are.
<<Deck>>
Roll snowball up hill, get the stuff, got it!
<<Tim>>
It's pretty steep though, don't let it roll back down or it'll melt.
<<Deck>>
Okay! Snowman time!

title: level2
body:
<<Deck>> 
Why's it melt so fast?
<<Tim>> 
Probably has to do with whatever makes this type of snow so different from regular snow.
<<Merry>>
We'll see, just as soon as you guys get all the pieces back.
<<Wenn>>
You better not miss anything!
<<Deck>>
It's your fault we're out here.
<<Merry>>
Hey, cool it.
<<Tim>>
chuckles That won't be a problem.

title: level3
body:
<<Deck>>
Hey Tim, why not just open the gate now, I can roll the ball over, and we can at least have a snowman to play with.
<<Deck>>
Merry doesn't have to kn-
<<Merry>>
Don't even think about it.
<< Main Menu>>
